name: Shift (itch) (WinkMoose)
description:
This game is a short 2d platformer made for the LM0B Beginners Game Jam #8. The theme of the jam is unstable so I made a rage game that makes the player mentally unstable. This is also the first game I've ever made. 

Control: 

A: move left

D: move right

Space: to jump

R: to reset the current level

Left Shift: to change perspective or 'Shift'

Shifting changes which angle you look at the game (your height doesn't change when you shift) 

Platforms: 

White doesn't do anything

Green is bouncy 

Red are buttons 

What to do:

In each level you need to press every button.
